- "Choe, Mike" <mchoe@...> wrote:
> hello all.
> i am trying to unit=
 test my entity bean after deploying it on
> weblogic
> 5.1 server.  the te=
st bombs when i execute "home.create( )".  for
> some
> reason the junit cl=
ient is unable to talk to the server.  anyone know
> what the problem may b=
e?  here is the output message from JUnit.
> 
> -----------------
> There w=
as 1 failure:
> 1) testCreate(test.com.gensys.framework.ejb.GsUserSessionTe=
st) ";
> nested
> excepti
> on is:
>         weblogic.rmi.ServerError: A Re=
moteException occurred in the
> server metho
> d
>  - with nested exception=
:
> [java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Ljavax/ejb/Handle;]"
> 
> FAILURES!!!
=
> Tests run: 1,  Failures: 1,  Errors: 0
> ----------------------
> 

Verif=
y that the JVM running the test has the javax.ejb package in the
CLASSPATH =
(ejb.jar).  The server is probably trying to marshal the
Handle object to t=
he client, and it can't be unmarshalled given the
current CLASSPATH.

Mike
